value.title: AI in Media Production: Auto-Generating Soundtracks and Social Media
value.excerpt: The broadcaster uses AI to generate shorter form versions of its broadcasts, which can be posted on social networks. News reports are the primary content used here, but travel programmes are cut down using AI, and it’s even used to pick likely thumbnails for each piece.
